definition: hard to understand/difficult to deal with/knotty/complicated

sentences.english: Contains settings to manage Remote Procedure Call troubleshooting .
sentences.chinese: 包含管理遠程過程調用疑難解答的設置。

sentences.english: The answers to difficult problems are usually not found in the same place as the problems.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能在問題的出處找到解決疑難問題的方法。

sentences.english: Describe a time when a problem wast resolved to your satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 描寫你對於疑難題目的措置懲罰不稱心的一次履歷。

sentences.english: The goal is to be able to look at complex diseases like cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我們的目標是能夠診斷像癌症這樣的疑難雜症。

sentences.english: Without question, if Tirol could be saved by hellos actions.
sentences.chinese: 一沒有疑難問，要是如容許以挽救泰洛的話。

sentences.english: Answer:Check the system clock on the users computer.
sentences.chinese: 你正在對一個用戶的漫遊配置文件進行疑難解答。

sentences.english: Eliminating problems by transferring the blame to ananpeople else is frequently cwhichleed scape-goating.
sentences.chinese: 用怪罪別人的技巧來解決疑難通常被稱爲找尋替罪羊。

sentences.english: Vitamin D also may protect against hard diseases.
sentences.chinese: 維生素D對一些疑難病的治療也有幫助。

sentences.english: It provides theoretical basis for exploring the objectivity of difficult cases.
sentences.chinese: 這爲探尋疑難案件的客觀性提供了理論依據。

sentences.english: Consult a 2003 card remote management capabilities to the next difficult.
sentences.chinese: 請教2003下網卡遠程管理功能地疑難。

sentences.english: In practice, many knotty problems arise in the trial of bribery and corruption cases.
sentences.chinese: 實踐中，貪污賄賂案件經常產生一些疑難問題。

sentences.english: Be the key developer and troubleshooter for our wholesale website.
sentences.chinese: 對我們的批發網站的主要開發商和疑難解答。

sentences.english: Please try these troubleshooting steps to resolve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 請嘗試這些疑難解答步驟解決問題。

sentences.english: The questions and specific symptoms used to assess PBD criteria differed.
sentences.chinese: 疑難和特定的症狀往往用於評估不同的PBD標準。

sentences.english: Hard cases are the center of Dworking's theory.
sentences.chinese: 疑難案件是德沃金理論關注的中心。

sentences.english: The more we think about this question, the harder it is to answer.
sentences.chinese: 對於這個疑難，咱們念得越多就越易答覆。

definition: lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it/to take appropriate steps
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
to apply to/to put into (practice etc)/to put to (a test, a vote etc)
to feel the pulse/to take sb's pulse
